dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and Forbes actually pegs it at 24.1 billion, but he says his cash on hand is surprisingly low.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and Forbes actually pegs it at twenty four point one billion, but he says his cash on hand is surprisingly low.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Tesla and SpaceX CEO confirmed he has roughly a $20 billion fortune (Forbes pegs it at $23.6 billion), but added that his liquid assets are relatively low.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, like, almost all of it is tied up in Tesla and SpaceX stock—something like 99% of his net worth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, like, almost all of it is tied up in Tesla and SpaceX stock-something like ninety nine percent of his net worth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As much as 99% of Musks wealth is held in shares of those two companies, Forbes estimates, which helps explain his lack of liquidity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which uh, makes a huge judgment in this trial really risky for him. He might have to sell shares, which he's avoided doing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which uh, makes a huge judgment in this trial really risky for him. He might have to sell shares, which he's avoided doing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If the jury levels a large judgment against Musk, he may have to sell part of his stake in Tesla or SpaceX, a move he has historically avoided.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Or borrow more against them, which he's already done—he owes over 520 million in debt, some to Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or borrow more against them, which he's already done-he owes over five hundred twenty million in debt, some to Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: That includes $208.9 million in liabilities owed to Morgan Stanley and $213 million borrowed from an affiliate of Goldman Sachs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And he's pledged nearly half his Tesla stake as collateral for those loans. That's a huge risk.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he's pledged nearly half his Tesla stake as collateral for those loans. That's a huge risk.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Musk has pledged nearly half of his Tesla stake as collateral for those loans.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's wild though, 'cause he's been through this before—sold Zip2, then PayPal, made a fortune early on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's wild though, 'cause he's been through this before-sold Zip2, then PayPal, made a fortune early on.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He made his first fortune after selling Zip2, a software firm, to Compaq in 1999 for a reported price of more than $300 million. Three years later Paypal, which he also cofounded, was acquired by eBay for $1.4 billion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But he put so much of that into SpaceX and Tesla, like he said it wasn't about maximizing riches, it was about affecting humanity's future.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But he put so much of that into SpaceX and Tesla, like he said it wasn't about maximizing riches, it was about affecting humanity's future.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The South Africa native founded SpaceX in 2002 and joined Tesla in 2004; the firms quickly exhausted most of his PayPal earnings, according to a 2015 Musk biography. Instead he founded the space exploration company, he said, because it was his way to most affect the future of humanity and civilization.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Though lately, it feels like the vision gets overshadowed—like that Cybertruck window shattering moment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Though lately, it feels like the vision gets overshadowed-like that Cybertruck window shattering moment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh man, that was painful to watch. "Oh my God," he said—but then 260,000 preorders anyway!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh man, that was painful to watch. Oh my God, he said-but then two hundred sixty thousand preorders anyway!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Oh my fing God, said a surprised Musk. Still, Musk reports that more than 250,000 customers have preordered the vehicle.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Guess people still believe in the big ideas, even with the stumbles.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Guess people still believe in the big ideas, even with the stumbles.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But the financial pressure is real—court case, debts, illiquid wealth… it's a lot hanging in the balance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the financial pressure is real-court case, debts, illiquid wealth... it's a lot hanging in the balance.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. High stakes for one of the most watched entrepreneurs out there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. High stakes for one of the most watched entrepreneurs out there.
